fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
**Sting**: Sting a player, attacking them.
**Pollinate:** Target a player: Anybody visiting there neighbors will instead visit them.
**Build Nest:** Build a nest at a players house: If you die, they die too (1 night cooldown.)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you use sting, you die.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Slay all else and turn them into gear
